title: Manual Testing Mastery
description: Master manual testing techniques to ensure software quality and functionality. This course covers testing fundamentals, test case creation, defect tracking, and hands-on experience with real-world testing scenarios.
about: This course is designed to give you in-depth knowledge of manual testing, including techniques for writing test cases, identifying defects, and ensuring the software functions as expected. Gain practical experience through hands-on projects and learn the best practices in manual testing.

highlights.name: Testing Fundamentals
highlights.description: Learn the basics of manual testing, including types of testing, SDLC, and STLC.

highlights.name: Test Case Writing
highlights.description: Master the art of writing effective test cases for various software applications.

highlights.name: Bug Reporting and Tracking
highlights.description: Understand how to identify, report, and track defects using industry-standard tools.

highlights.name: Real-world Testing Scenarios
highlights.description: Apply testing techniques to real-world applications and scenarios.

highlights.name: Quality Assurance Best Practices
highlights.description: Learn best practices for software quality assurance and test management.

roles.title: Manual Test Engineer
roles.description: Design and execute test cases to ensure software quality and identify defects.

roles.title: QA Analyst
roles.description: Perform manual testing to verify software functionality and report issues.

roles.title: Test Lead
roles.description: Lead the testing efforts, manage teams, and ensure testing processes are followed.

roles.title: Software Tester
roles.description: Test software applications to ensure they meet functional requirements.

faq.question: Do I need prior experience in software testing?
faq.answer: No prior experience is needed. The course covers the fundamentals of manual testing.

faq.question: What tools will I learn in this course?
faq.answer: You will learn tools like JIRA for bug tracking, TestRail for test case management, and other industry-standard tools.

faq.question: What projects will I work on during this course?
faq.answer: You will work on projects such as functional testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing for web and mobile applications.

faq.question: Will I receive a certificate after completing the course?
faq.answer: Yes, a certificate will be awarded upon successful completion of the course.

faq.question: What is the expected career growth after completing this course?
faq.answer: After completing this course, you will be prepared for roles in manual testing and quality assurance in software development companies.
